t: Everything We Learned About Amazon From Bezos' Testimony
s: July 30, 2020 - 20 takeaways from the CEO's appearance before the House Judiciary Committee.

t: Amazon Brand Protection Report 2023: Protecting against counterfeits
s: March 26, 2024 - Our fourth annual report highlights four key areas helping to drive counterfeits to zero.

t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: Enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry to unlock tools designed to protect and build your brand, creating a better experience for your Amazon customers.

t: How Amazon uses AI innovations to stop fraud and counterfeits
s: March 26, 2025 - More than 2.5 billion product units have been verified as genuine through Amazon's Transparency program, and it has enrolled 88,000 brands worldwide, including Fortune 500 companies, global brands, startups, and small businesses.

t: Resource Library - Trustworthy Shopping at Amazon
s: Browse our library of reports and research detailing Amazon’s efforts to create a trustworthy and safe shopping experience for our customers.

t: VFAUOSIT Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Whisper08 | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using these faucets and contact Whisper08 about disposal and a refund. Consumers will need to provide a photograph of disposal and their order number to receive the refund. Whisper08 is contacting all known purchasers directly.Until these faucets can be replaced, ...

t: The Amazon Brand Story Module: Everything You Need to Know
s: November 11, 2024 - The Amazon brand story is part of A+ content. Learn why it's a great way to connect and build trust with customers, and drive traffic to your Amazon store.

t: Amazon Brand Story: Everything you Need to Know - Kenji ROI
s: March 28, 2023 - How to use the Brand Story feature in Amazon A+ Content to boost conversion rates. Examples of good Brand Stories and best practices.

t: Sponsored Brands – Increase brand awareness | Amazon Ads
s: Sponsored ads on Amazon help build your brand and drive sales. Invest in long-term business growth by advertising your brand and products on Amazon.

November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: Exploring New Narratives: A/B Test Brand Stories on Amazon!
s: In the fast-paced world of e-commerce, staying ahead requires innovation and strategic thinking. Amazon, being a colossal marketplace, continually introduces features to help sellers thrive. And here’s the game-changer: A/B testing your brand stories on Amazon.

t: Amazon releases its first Brand Protection Report
s: May 10, 2021 - Our first-ever report shows Amazon’s progress in driving counterfeit to zero in our store.

t: Amazon brand usage guidelines for 3-party display ads | Amazon Ads
s: Using the Amazon.com name or branding elements can help you get results. Learn more about our brand use guidelines.
June 8, 2022 - Dharmesh Mehta, vice president, Worldwide Selling Partner Services, shares Amazon's annual Brand Protection Report.
